s_synopsis: Armored Warriors is a 2D side-scrolling mecha-themed beat 'em-up game that puts players in the shoes of a mecha pilot. In 2281, Earth and the planet Raia ended a half a century lasting war. But a year after the ceasefire the Raian capital was captured by an unknown army. Earth has send an army to retake it under the pretext of protecting the citizens. But in reality Earth wants to bring Raia under it’s control.
